sourcesContent:
import { CalendarIcon, UserIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { ChevronLeftIcon, ChevronRightIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function BlogPage() { const { id } = useParams(); const [blog, Setblogs] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { document.title = `ForendonBlog | ${id ? blog.title : "Ana Sayfa"}`; const fetchAllblogs = async () => { try { const getblogs = await axios.get("http://localhost:7007/api/posts"); const blogsdata = getblogs.data; const filteredBlogs = blogsdata.filter(blog => blog.id === id); Setblogs(filteredBlogs); } catch (error) { console.error("Veriler çekilirken bir hata oluştu:", error); } }; fetchAllblogs(); }, [id]); const formatDate = (dateString) => { const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' }; const date = new Date(dateString); return date.toLocaleDateString('tr-TR', options); }; return (

{blog?.cate?.toUpperCase()}

{blog.title}

Yazar: {blog.username}

{formatDate(blog.date)}

{blog.desc}...

Previous Next

97 sonuçtan 1 ile 10 {' '} arası gösteriliyor

Previous 1 2 3 ... 8 9 10 Next
) }
